--3-5160449092-9309180677=:7
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Hello all,

Can anyone explain me why this little script doesn't work:

fro=
m Cantera import *
import pylab

g=3DIdealGasMix('gri30.cti')
g.set(T =3D 3=
00.0, P =3D OneAtm, X =3D 'CH4:0.95,O2:2,N2:7.52')
g.equilibrate('HP')
prin=
t g

while this one works perfectly well (which is the same script except
t=
hat the pylab library import was commented):
from Cantera import *
#import =
pylab

g=3DIdealGasMix('gri30.cti')
g.set(T =3D 300.0, P =3D OneAtm, X =3D =
'CH4:0.95,O2:2,N2:7.52')
g.equilibrate('HP')
print g

Is it some kind of bu=
g or something else (I'm just a python beginner).
Stef

Hello all,<br><br>Can anyone explain me why this little script doesn't work=
:<br><br><font color=3D"#ff0000">from Cantera import *<br><b>import pylab</=
b><br><br>g=3DIdealGasMix('gri30.cti')<br>g.set(T =3D 300.0, P =3D OneAtm, =
X =3D 'CH4:0.95,O2:2,N2:7.52')<br>g.equilibrate('HP')<br>print g<br></font>=
<br>while this one works perfectly well (which is the same script except th=
at the pylab library import was commented):<br><font color=3D"#ff007f">from=
 Cantera import *<br><b>#import pylab</b><br><br>g=3DIdealGasMix('gri30.cti=
')<br>g.set(T =3D 300.0, P =3D OneAtm, X =3D 'CH4:0.95,O2:2,N2:7.52')<br>g.=
equilibrate('HP')<br>print g<br></font><br>Is it some kind of bug or someth=
ing else (I'm just a python beginner).<br>Stef
